items.content_html: A simple and lightweight Todo app built with React. This app allows users to add tasks, mark them as done by clicking on the task, remove tasks using a button on the right side of each task, clear all tasks with a "Clear All" button, and uncheck tasks by clicking on them again.
items.title: Haileamlak1/react-todo-app: A simple and lightweight Todo app built with React. This app allows users to add tasks, mark them as done by clicking on the task, remove tasks using a button on the right side of each task, clear all tasks with a "Clear All" button, and uncheck tasks by clicking on them again.

items.content_html: ReactMDB is a lightweight React project featuring a movie database sourced from JSON. It includes search functionality and a watchlist to track favorite movies. Built for practicing React fundamentals and component-based architecture.
items.title: heshamyasser99/ReactMDB: ReactMDB is a lightweight React project featuring a movie database sourced from JSON. It includes search functionality and a watchlist to track favorite movies. Built for practicing React fundamentals and component-based architecture.

items.content_html: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.
items.title: mini-360/LinkShortner: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.
